gaigs2
Class LegendNode

java.lang.Object
  gaigs2.LegendNode

public class LegendNode
extends java.lang.Object

Class to store the information for each element in the color legend. A LegendNode stores the color that is to appear in the legend element's box and the text that is to appear next to the this box.

Version:
1.0 (29 June 2006)
Author:
Andrew Jungwirth

Field Summary
 java.lang.String color
          The hex color String that defines the color that is to be displayed in the key box.
 LinkedList text
          The text that is to appear next to the box.
 
Constructor Summary
LegendNode()
          Default LegendNode constructor.
 
Method Summary
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Field Detail

color

public java.lang.String color
The hex color String that defines the color that is to be displayed in the key box.

text

public LinkedList text
The text that is to appear next to the box. Each element of this LinkedList should be a String containing a line of the text that is to appear next to the box. A multiline label should be stored with each line in a separate element in the LinkedList.

Constructor Detail

LegendNode

public LegendNode()
Default LegendNode constructor. The color is set to black (i.e., "#000000"), and the text LinkedList is initialized using its default constructor.
